Rowdy Wolf:






"I don't take you as a Maximal spy" he said. "Quickstrike didn't say much on 
Maximal spies, but he did mention one---" Rowdy Wolf was suddenly interupted 
by Suukie. He turned his head, looking over his shoulder. "Who in the world 
are you?" He wanted to grab for his rifle.
